translation.en: Move over. Hey, this is Luke, this is my film.
translation.zh: 让一下 我是卢克 这是我的电影

translation.en: Let me ask you a couple of questions.
translation.zh: 问你几个问题

translation.en: -[beeping] -Why do you dance?
translation.zh: 问你几个问题 你为什么跳舞？

translation.en: Because it's like breathing.
translation.zh: 因为对我来说

translation.en: It's like walking to me.
translation.zh: 跳舞就是呼吸 就是走路

translation.en: I'm not pretending. When I dance, I don't pretend.
translation.zh: 不做作 跳舞时 我毫不做作

translation.en: I'm more myself when I dance than any other moment in the day.
translation.zh: 一天当中 跳舞时比任何时候都更像自己

translation.en: I dance to become someone else.
translation.zh: 我跳舞是想成为另一个自己

translation.en: There are so many things in this world that want to push down on you.
translation.zh: 世界上有很多东西想要羁绊你

translation.en: But when you dance, you are free.
translation.zh: 但跳舞时 你是自由的

translation.en: We started dancing at the age of seven,
translation.zh: 我们七岁时就开始跳舞了

translation.en: in our house, in the living room.
translation.zh: 在家里 在客厅

translation.en: Just dancing, copying Michael Jackson.
translation.zh: 就是跳舞 跳舞 模仿 模仿迈克尔·杰克逊

translation.en: And I'm listening to the music in the grocery store,
translation.zh: 我就是喜欢在杂货店里听音乐

translation.en: just dancing through the aisles and stuff like that.
translation.zh: 就是喜欢跟着 阿尔维斯之类的音乐跳舞 我妈说：“消停点 控制下自己”

translation.en: She's like, "Contain yourself. Calm down!"
translation.zh: 我妈说：“消停点 控制下自己” 我就说：“我停不下来 就得跳舞 不跳不行”

translation.en: And I'm like, "I can't stop. I have to do it, I have to do it!"
translation.zh: 我就说：“我停不下来 就得跳舞 不跳不行”

translation.en: After everybody went to sleep, I would
translation.zh: 大家都去睡觉之后 我就会

translation.en: open the garage and just practice.
translation.zh: 打开车库练习 当我意识到可能喜欢跳舞时

translation.en: That's when I knew, like, I loved it because I had never dedicated
translation.zh: 已经不能自拔了 因为我从没对什么事倾注过

translation.en: so much time and effort into something like that.
translation.zh: 这么多时间和努力

translation.en: It's not us just jumping around. Dance has vocabulary.
translation.zh: 并不只是跳来跳去 舞蹈也有语言

translation.en: -Inglewood. -I'm from Argentina.
translation.zh: -英格尔伍德 -我来自阿根廷

translation.en: I am from northern Uganda.
translation.zh: -我来自北乌干达 -佛罗里达迈阿密

translation.en: -Miami, Florida. -Koreatown, Los Angeles.
translation.zh: -我来自北乌干达 -佛罗里达迈阿密 洛杉矶韩国城

translation.en: There's a lot of gangs and violence.
translation.zh: 有很多帮派和暴力

translation.en: I couldn't be stuck there all my life.
translation.zh: 我不能一辈子被困在那种地方

translation.en: My village was attacked. My parents didn't want me around.
translation.zh: -我住的村子遭到袭击 -我父母都不想要我了

translation.en: She actually kicked me out of the house.
translation.zh: 事实上 她是把我赶出家门的

translation.en: -I had to go. -Dance saved me.
translation.zh: -我不得不离开 -舞蹈拯救了我

translation.en: Dance definitely saved me.
translation.zh: 绝对是舞蹈拯救了我 如果不是舞蹈

translation.en: If it wasn't for dance, I don't know what we would be doing now.
translation.zh: 我都不知道现在我在做什么

translation.en: I didn't have anything, didn't have money.
translation.zh: 我什么也没有 没有钱 在纽约市 我曾经一周只有15美元生活费

translation.en: I was living with $15 a week in New York City.
translation.zh: 在纽约市 我曾经一周只有15美元生活费

translation.en: Dance brought us together, too.
translation.zh: 舞蹈让我们走到一起

translation.en: All around the world, we're here.
translation.zh: 走向世界 我们在这儿

translation.en: Truth is, everybody's a dancer inside.
translation.zh: 实际上 每个人都是自己的舞者

translation.en: We all have a heartbeat. We all have a rhythm inside.
translation.zh: -我们的心都在跳动 -我身体里面有一个节奏

translation.en: What's that one thing you say?
translation.zh: 你说的那句什么来的

translation.en: Yeah, what do you call us?
translation.zh: 你说的那句什么来的 你叫我们什么

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: -舞匣子 -对

translation.en: Boom box! That's a pretty good one.
translation.zh: 这说法好

translation.en: Born from a boom box.
translation.zh: 舞匣子

translation.en: [Luke] It sounds stupid, but I do feel like that.
translation.zh: 听起来很傻 但我真的感觉是那样

translation.en: And if we listen hard enough,
translation.zh: 如果听得足够用心

translation.en: we realize that maybe we're all plugged into the same song.
translation.zh: 也许会意识到我们都痴迷同一首歌

translation.en: New York university freshmen, welcome to Washington square park.
translation.zh: 大学新生们 欢迎来到华盛顿广场公园

translation.en: It's the central hub of our urban campus. And to the right…
translation.zh: 这里是城市校园的中心枢纽 右边…

translation.en: Mom, dad, you guys can really go.
translation.zh: 老妈 老爸 你们真的可以走了

translation.en: No! We're gonna take you and Camille out for dinner.
translation.zh: 不 我们要带你和卡梅利亚出去吃饭

translation.en: We promised her parents we'd feed her.
translation.zh: 我答应她的家人要招待她

translation.en: We're already paying for meal plans. It's all good.
translation.zh: 不是已经招待了吗？我们不饿

translation.en: Yeah, we're fine. We really are, Mrs. A.
translation.zh: 我们不饿 真的 安太太

translation.en: -We should go. -All right. One last picture.
translation.zh: -我们走吧 -好吧 再照最后一张

translation.en: Okay. One last picture.
translation.zh: -我们走吧 -好吧 再照最后一张 -好 最后一张 -好的

translation.en: All right. Get together. You're best friends. Can drive a truck through you.
translation.zh: 这可是你朋友 别搞得那么陌生似的

translation.en: -We're close. -Get closer.
translation.zh: -我们靠很近了 -再近一点

translation.en: -Put your arm around her. -Okay. [Dad] Yeah, that's nice.
translation.zh: -把手搭在她肩上 -好

translation.en: [Mom] All right, ready? Say, "Mom is pretty."
translation.zh: 好 准备 说老妈真漂亮

translation.en: [both] Mom is pretty.
translation.zh: -老妈真漂亮 -谢谢

translation.en: -Thank you! Ready? Ooh! -[beeping]
translation.zh: -老妈真漂亮 -谢谢 准备 好 照到脑袋了 就这样

translation.en: Good. It's a picture of a hat. I got a hat. With hair.
translation.zh: 准备 好 照到脑袋了 就这样

translation.en: If my father could see me now saying goodbye to my son,
translation.zh: 我老爸现在能看到我 对我儿子 未来的工程师说再见了

translation.en: the future engineer.
translation.zh: 对我儿子 未来的工程师说再见了

translation.en: I'm just so happy you're done with
translation.zh: 我真的很高兴

translation.en: that dance business, I can't tell you.
translation.zh: 你结束了跳舞生涯 我不能告诉你

translation.en: Oh, but you have.
translation.zh: 你结束了跳舞生涯 我不能告诉你 你已经告诉了

translation.en: Okay. All right. You make me proud. Okay. This is it.
translation.zh: -好吧 你让我自豪 -好 就这样

translation.en: Could I get in your backpack? -Come on! -That's too tight, mom.
translation.zh: 能拍拍我的背吗 来吧

translation.en: -Okay. All right. -Come on!
translation.zh: -好 好吧 -快点

translation.en: I'll make you proud if I could go to orientation.
translation.zh: 我得先去新生介绍会 才能让你自豪啊

translation.en: No, you're my baby. Everybody left already.
translation.zh: -不 你是我的宝贝 -大家都走了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I'll call you when I get to the dorm.
translation.zh: 到宿舍给你们打电话

translation.en: Wear deodorant. Every day.
translation.zh: 要记得每天都要喷体香剂哦

translation.en: Honey. Come on.
translation.zh: 好吗 亲爱的 这很重要

translation.en: Honey, it's important, because you're a man now.
translation.zh: 好吗 亲爱的 这很重要 -你是男子汉了 -亲爱的 要塞车了

translation.en: Come on, we gotta beat the traffic.
translation.zh: -你是男子汉了 -亲爱的 要塞车了

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: -好 -哇

translation.en: Wow, they really…
translation.zh: -好 -哇 -他们真的… -让我尴尬

translation.en: Are embarrassing.
translation.zh: -他们真的… -让我尴尬

translation.en: I was gonna say, "Love you." oh…
translation.zh: 我是想说 他们很爱你

translation.en: Yo, cam, check those out. Those are the limited edition gunmetal Nike dunks.
translation.zh: 卡梅利亚 看啊 那是限量版的 青铜色耐克Dunk系列球鞋

translation.en: Uh-oh.
translation.zh: 卡梅利亚 看啊 那是限量版的 青铜色耐克Dunk系列球鞋 我懂这种表情

translation.en: I know that look. Okay, Moose, seriously,
translation.zh: 我懂这种表情 好 穆斯 说真的 我们接下来要去联合广场

translation.en: next on the tour, union square.
translation.zh: 好 穆斯 说真的 我们接下来要去联合广场

translation.en: I just want to get a closer look. I'm gonna be right back, okay? Cover me.
translation.zh: 我想靠近一点看看 马上回来 好吗？帮我打个掩护

translation.en: I guess.
translation.zh: 可以吧

translation.en: All right. Let's go. Who you got? Who you got?
translation.zh: 开始 开始 你赌谁赢

translation.en: I want 25 on kid darkness. [boy] Twenty-five on darkness. Let's go. Whatcha got?
translation.zh: -我押25美元在黑暗小子身上 -25美元达克尼斯 开始

translation.en: -Give me my money. Give me my money. -All right, I got you. [man] Snap! Did you see that?
translation.zh: -给我钱 -不好意思 朋友 我赢你了

translation.en: -I want ten on the skinny kid. -[mouthing]
translation.zh: 我押10元在那瘦小子身上

translation.en: Give me 20. Give me 20!
translation.zh: 给我20

translation.en: Yo, you see that?
translation.zh: 你看到了吗？

translation.en: Yo, it's over, it's over. That's it. Go home. Go home!
translation.zh: 结束了 就这样了 回家吧

translation.en: Come on, new kid, get in there!
translation.zh: 加油 新来的 站进去!

translation.en: [woman] Come on, let's see what you got!
translation.zh: 来吧 让我们看看你有什么本事

translation.en: Who's going to pay for my balloons? He's right here! Get this guy.
translation.zh: 我的损失谁负责 他在这儿 快来抓他 -抓住他 -别跑 警察

translation.en: Stop! Police! Hold it right there.
translation.zh: -抓住他 -别跑 警察

translation.en: Come on, man. They're after you. Let's go. Come on!
translation.zh: 快点 老兄 他们抓你来了 快跑

translation.en: Come on, let's go.
translation.zh: 快 快跑 快跑

translation.en: All right, time out. I can't… Don't have time for that. Come on!
translation.zh: -先停一下 不行 -快跑

translation.en: -Freeze! -Stop! Hey, get out of the way!
translation.zh: -警察！ -闪开！

translation.en: What are you doing? What are you doing?
translation.zh: 等等 你在做什么

translation.en: Jump first, fear later.
translation.zh: 先跳 等下再害怕

translation.en: Oh, excuse me!
translation.zh: 借过一下

translation.en: Oh! Ah! My ribcage.
translation.zh: 我的胸腔

translation.en: [panting] I have to tell you, I just threw up in my mouth.
translation.zh: 我的心都要跳出来了

translation.en: It's burning.
translation.zh: 火辣辣的

translation.en: Where you going?
translation.zh: 你去哪儿？

translation.en: Yo. How did you just do that back there?
translation.zh: 刚才在那儿你是怎么做到的？

translation.en: You were, like, freaking flying, man. You're like a ninja.
translation.zh: 莫名其妙地飞了过去 像忍者一样

translation.en: It's Luke. No, it's like this. You gotta blow it up.
translation.zh: -我是卢克 -不 要像这样 你得让它爆一下

translation.en: How was that?
translation.zh: 这样如何？

translation.en: All right. I'm Robert Alexander iii, by the way.
translation.zh: 对了 我大名叫罗伯特·亚历山大三世

translation.en: Just since you asked. But you can just call me Moose.
translation.zh: 既然你问起了 但你可以直接叫我穆斯

translation.en: I haven't seen you around.
translation.zh: -以前没见过你 -我刚来纽约大学

translation.en: I'm just starting at NYU. I'm actually an engineering major.
translation.zh: -以前没见过你 -我刚来纽约大学 实际上 我是工程学专业的

translation.en: But you're gonna be dancing, too?
translation.zh: 但你也会跳舞吧

translation.en: No, no. Not anymore. I mean, dancing was cool in high school,
translation.zh: 不 不跳了 跳舞在高中很酷

translation.en: but it's time for me to face the real world.
translation.zh: 不过是我该面对现实的时候了

translation.en: You really have no idea what you did back there, do you?
translation.zh: 你真的不知道 刚才在那里做了什么 是吗？

translation.en: You're b-fabb.
translation.zh: 你是个舞匣子

translation.en: What's a b-fabb? "Born from a boom box."
translation.zh: -舞匣子是什么？ -就是天生会跳舞的人

translation.en: Some people learn to dance, others are born to.
translation.zh: 有些人学跳舞 另一些人天生就会

translation.en: And you're in New York city, the dance center of the world.
translation.zh: 你现在在纽约市 世界的舞蹈中心

translation.en: Check this. It's the biggest battle ever.
translation.zh: 看 有史以来最大的竞舞

translation.en: There's never been this kind of prize money.
translation.zh: 从没有过像这样大笔的奖金

translation.en: And those guys in the park, they're gearing up for this.
translation.zh: 公园的那些家伙有实力赢得比赛

translation.en: You're good enough. You should be in this.
translation.zh: 你也有实力 也该参加比赛

translation.en: That's your car?
translation.zh: 这是你的车吗？

translation.en: [chuckling] Oh, my God, that's so sick. Get in.
translation.zh: -老天 太帅了 -上车

translation.en: What you saw in the park today is just the beginning.
translation.zh: 今天你在公园看到的只是个开始

translation.en: This is it.
translation.zh: 到了

translation.en: What the heck is this place? Come on.
translation.zh: -这是什么地方啊？ -来吧

translation.en: Welcome to my house. The house of pirates.
translation.zh: 欢迎光临寒舍 海盗的老窝

translation.en: Nice place. It's a little small to live in.
translation.zh: 地方不错 不过住的话有点小

translation.en: My parents converted this place years ago.
translation.zh: 我爸妈几年前把这里重装修了一番

translation.en: We all live and train upstairs and
translation.zh: 我们住和训练都在楼上

translation.en: run a club downstairs to make ends meet.
translation.zh: （警告：所有乘此货运电梯的人 后果自负） 楼下经营俱乐部来维生

translation.en: It's kind of like our secret hideout. All right, this is it.
translation.zh: 有点像秘密的藏身之处 好 到了

translation.en: We call this the vault.
translation.zh: 我们称之为保险库

translation.en: Around here, dance is your identity.
translation.zh: 在这儿 舞蹈就是你的身份

translation.en: We live together, work together, battle together.
translation.zh: 我们一起住 一起工作 一起比赛 不像其他的团队

translation.en: But unlike other crews, we all have different styles.
translation.zh: 一起比赛 不像其他的团队 每个人都有不同的风格

translation.en: I found all these guys out in the city.
translation.zh: 这些家伙都是我在这个城市找到的

translation.en: Crazy talent, but no place to go.
translation.zh: 拥有傲人的天赋 却没有立足之地

translation.en: We've become kind of a pseudo-family here.
translation.zh: 在这儿我们已经差不多是一家人了

translation.en: Where we can be ourselves and rules don't apply.
translation.zh: 我们的地盘我们做主 规矩管不了我们

translation.en: This place is off the chain.
translation.zh: 这地方太有意思了

translation.en: Thing one and thing two over there, that's the Santiago twins.
translation.zh: 那是来自圣地亚哥得双胞胎兄弟

translation.en: You, man, you. We saw you dancing at the park. You were…
translation.zh: 老兄 今天早上你在公园跳的舞

translation.en: -Amazing. -You were great.
translation.zh: 太了不起了 太厉害了

translation.en: You are from another planet. Your own planet.
translation.zh: -你从别的星球来的 -你自己的星球

translation.en: Your own world. You're just amazing, man.
translation.zh: 你自己的世界 你真了不起啊

translation.en: I have a question for you.
translation.zh: 我想问个问题

translation.en: No, guys. No questions.
translation.zh: 不 拜托 不许问

translation.en: I got it, I got it. Got it! Come on.
translation.zh: -我知道 -知道了

translation.en: You're great!
translation.zh: 你太棒了

translation.en: -Ah, Luke. -Jacob. What's up, brother? Meet Moose.
translation.zh: -卢克 -雅各布 你好啊

translation.en: -Pleased to meet you, Moose. -How you doing?
translation.zh: -这是穆斯 -很高兴见到你 穆斯

translation.en: This guy right here, he's the captain of the ship.
translation.zh: 这个家伙 他是这里的船长

translation.en: More like the first mate.
translation.zh: 这个家伙 他是这里的船长 更像是个大副

translation.en: I heard you did some impressive work in the park today.
translation.zh: 听说你今天在公园 做了件很了不起的事

translation.en: How does everybody know that?
translation.zh: 等下 怎么每个人都知道了

translation.en: News travels fast when you beat someone like kid darkness.
translation.zh: 你赢了像黑暗小子这样的人 消息会不胫而走的

translation.en: Luke, I need to borrow you for one second…
translation.zh: 卢克 我得耽误你一下下 我们有些事

translation.en: Can we wait? I gotta show him around.
translation.zh: 卢克 我得耽误你一下下 我们有些事 等一会儿行吗 我要带他转转先

translation.en: We'll take him.
translation.zh: 等一会儿行吗 我要带他转转先 我带他吧 拜托 让我们带他转吧

translation.en: Let us show him around.
translation.zh: 我带他吧 拜托 让我们带他转吧

translation.en: -I don't know about that, guys. -[all] Please?
translation.zh: 这我可不太确定 兄弟们

translation.en: -You can trust us. -What would Jesus do?
translation.zh: 拜托了 想一想耶稣会怎么做？

translation.en: All right. Don't hurt him, all right? Promise.
translation.zh: -好吧 答应我 别伤着他 好吗？ -保证

translation.en: Moose, this is the ticks. Good luck.
translation.zh: 穆斯 这是提克兄弟 祝你好运

translation.en: This came from the bank today. We're six months late on our payments.
translation.zh: 这是银行今天寄来的 我们的房租已经拖欠半年了

translation.en: We paid them last month.
translation.zh: 我们上个月才交的啊

translation.en: What about the other five?
translation.zh: 对 但另外五个月的怎么办？

translation.en: We're working on it. The club's not making the money it used to.
translation.zh: 我们正想办法 老兄 这个俱乐部不像以前那么赚钱了

translation.en: The bank doesn't want to hear that. They want the money
translation.zh: 银行可不想听到这个 他们要钱 如果拿不到的话

translation.en: and if they don't get it, they're going
translation.zh: 他们要钱 如果拿不到的话

translation.en: to put the vault up for public auction.
translation.zh: 他们就要公开拍卖这个保鲜库

translation.en: Listen, don't I always have a plan?
translation.zh: 听着 我不是总会想到办法吗？

translation.en: This kid Moose, he beat kid darkness today, with style.
translation.zh: 这个叫穆斯的小孩 今天赢了黑暗小子 而且赢得很有派头

translation.en: With a little training, this kid could be the spark we need
translation.zh: 稍微训练一下的话 这孩子 就是我们需要的希望之光

translation.en: to get everyone together and win the 100 grand from the world jam
translation.zh: 和大家一起 赢到十万美元

translation.en: and pay back what we owe.
translation.zh: 度过非常时期 并还清我们的欠款

translation.en: Look, Jacob, we're not gonna lose the vault, all right?
translation.zh: 雅各布 我们不会失去保险库的 好吗？

translation.en: We won't let that happen.
translation.zh: 雅各布 我们不会失去保险库的 好吗？ 我们不会让它发生的

translation.en: [man] You don't understand, nobody ever smoked kid darkness and got it on tape.
translation.zh: 你不明白 从来都没有人 打败过黑暗小子 还把它录了下来

translation.en: -That was serious. -You're the man!
translation.zh: -那可是真格的 -你太帅了

translation.en: You think the Samurais is gonna let you go like that?
translation.zh: 你以为武士会这样算了吗？

translation.en: They'll find you and they'll battle you again.
translation.zh: 他们会找到你 再次向你挑战

translation.en: -The sama-who? -The house of Samurai.
translation.zh: -武什么？ -武士街舞团

translation.en: The most cutthroat house in the city. -Our fiercest rival. -Yeah!
translation.zh: -全市最难搞定的 -我们最难缠的对手

translation.en: What do you mean they're gonna find me?
translation.zh: 他们会找到我是什么意思？

translation.en: They've got technology out there now.
translation.zh: 他们有高科技

translation.en: Like the bears with the GPS inside? Watch out, they're behind you!
translation.zh: 就像是体内有GPS的熊

translation.en: Come on, that's enough.
translation.zh: 拜托 够了 别听他们吓唬你 老兄

translation.en: Don't let them freak you out. You're with us now.
translation.zh: 拜托 够了 别听他们吓唬你 老兄 -你现在跟我们一伙了 -没人敢欺负我们的人

translation.en: And nobody messes with us. Not even the Samurai.
translation.zh: -你现在跟我们一伙了 -没人敢欺负我们的人 -武士也不行 -当然不行 除非你想被痛扁

translation.en: Not unless you wanna get roasted.
translation.zh: -武士也不行 -当然不行 除非你想被痛扁

translation.en: What in the… Okay, you don't get it, but I know what I'm saying.
translation.zh: -什么？ -好吧 你们听不懂

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 不过我知道我说了什么

translation.en: [man] You got it, you got it…
translation.zh: 你懂了

translation.en: She's back. The one I've been telling you about.
translation.zh: 她又来了 就是我一直跟你说的那个人

translation.en: Hey, Moose, come on. I'll show you around the club downstairs.
translation.zh: 穆斯 过来 我带你去楼下的俱乐部看看

translation.en: -[all] Aw! -Party pooper! [man] Come on, Luke.
translation.zh: -扫兴鬼！ -来吧 卢克

translation.en: -[upbeat dance music playing] -Come on. This way.
translation.zh: 快点 这边

translation.en: [Luke] Watch out, they bite.
translation.zh: 小心 他们会咬人

translation.en: It's crazy, right? Hang out, take a look around.
translation.zh: 很疯 是不是 玩吧 随便转转

translation.en: I'll be back in a second.
translation.zh: 很疯 是不是 玩吧 随便转转 我马上就回来

translation.en: Nobody battles a Samurai just once.
translation.zh: 没人可以跟武士对决一次就完事了

translation.en: Where do you think you're going? This ain't over yet.
translation.zh: 你去哪儿 我们还没开始呢

translation.en: I just want a few rounds with the kid.
translation.zh: 我只想和那小子比上几轮

translation.en: We got some unfinished business.
translation.zh: 我们有些事还没了结

translation.en: You wanna get to him? You got to go through us.
translation.zh: 想和他比 先过我们这关

translation.en: Come on, Luke. Be a good sport.
translation.zh: 来吧 卢克 好好来比比

translation.en: What are you doing here, Julien?
translation.zh: 你来这里做什么 朱利安？

translation.en: Nice to see you, too.
translation.zh: -我也很高兴见到你 -带上你的人

translation.en: I mean it. Get your boys and get off our property.
translation.zh: -我也很高兴见到你 -带上你的人 离开我的地盘

translation.en: Your property?
translation.zh: 离开我的地盘 你们的地盘？ 很快就不是你们的地盘了

translation.en: It's not gonna be your property for much longer.
translation.zh: 你们的地盘？ 很快就不是你们的地盘了

translation.en: And don't worry.
translation.zh: 别担心 买下这里以后

translation.en: When I buy this place I'll take good care of it.
translation.zh: 别担心 买下这里以后 我会好好打理的

translation.en: When we win the world jam, you and your trust fund
translation.zh: 我们赢了比赛以后

translation.en: won't be able to touch us. [all] Ooh…
translation.zh: 你和你的臭钱就别想再打扰我们

translation.en: That's cute. Your boy can't even finish his battles.
translation.zh: 真有趣 你的伙计连这比赛都完成不了

translation.en: Bubbles and balloons? That's so amateur.
translation.zh: 肥皂泡和气球 太幼稚了 够了 老兄

translation.en: Enough, man. He will finish it at the world jam and so will we.
translation.zh: 他会在世界街舞大赛上完成的 我们也是

translation.en: I don't even know what you just said.
translation.zh: 我都不知道你刚才说了什么

translation.en: Stop being disrespectful to my crew.
translation.zh: 不许再对我的兄弟无礼了

translation.en: Come on, I'll get you out of here. Get off her, man!
translation.zh: 快来 我带你出去 放开她 老兄

translation.en: -Are you okay? -Yeah. Thank you.
translation.zh: -你还好吧？ -还好 谢谢

translation.en: I'm Natalie.
translation.zh: -我是卢克 -我叫娜塔莉

translation.en: So, what's with the bags?
translation.zh: 这些包是做什么的？

translation.en: Supposed to be meeting my friend here, but she's a no-show.
translation.zh: 本打算和朋友在这里见面的 -但是我想她来不了了 -那你打算怎么办？

translation.en: What are you going to do?
translation.zh: -但是我想她来不了了 -那你打算怎么办？

translation.en: I don't know. I haven't figured that out yet.
translation.zh: 不知道 还没想好呢

translation.en: You could stay here. What, in the club?
translation.zh: -你可以留在这儿 -什么？在俱乐部里

translation.en: No, I mean, upstairs in the living room.
translation.zh: 不 楼上的起居室

translation.en: You don't even know me.
translation.zh: -你都还不认识我 -不 我认识啊

translation.en: Yeah, I do. Your name is Natalie and you need a place to sleep.
translation.zh: -你都还不认识我 -不 我认识啊 你叫娜塔莉 要找个地方过夜

translation.en: Okay. Sure. Thank you.
translation.zh: 好 好吧 谢谢

translation.en: Okay. Grab your stuff.
translation.zh: 好 我带你出去吧

translation.en: You sure they won't mind?
translation.zh: 你确定他们不介意？

translation.en: Everyone here knows what it's like to be a nomad.
translation.zh: 这里每个人都知道流浪的滋味

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: -你是哪里人？ -本地人 不过

translation.en: But I've been living in London the last few years. Wow.
translation.zh: 前几年都住在伦敦

translation.en: Well, this place will be a departure.
translation.zh: 这个地方会是个新起点

translation.en: Thank you. You're welcome.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -不客气

translation.en: So you ready? For bed?
translation.zh: -准备好了吗？ -睡觉吗？

translation.en: No, for the battle. The world jam?
translation.zh: 不 比赛

translation.en: We could really use someone like you.
translation.zh: 世界街舞大会 我们需要像你这样的人

translation.en: You up for a little competition?
translation.zh: 你准备好来场小比赛了吗？

translation.en: It's what I live for. Been competing my whole life.
translation.zh: 活着就是为了这个 我一生都在比赛

translation.en: And do you win? I never lose.
translation.zh: -赢了吗？ -从没输过

translation.en: Then I'll see you in the morning.
translation.zh: 很好 明天早上见

translation.en: We got a lot of work to do.
translation.zh: 有好多事要做

translation.en: Moose…
translation.zh: 穆斯 昨天去哪儿了？

translation.en: Where were you yesterday? I thought we had plans.
translation.zh: 穆斯 昨天去哪儿了？ 我记得我们有计划的

translation.en: I know, I know. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -我知道 对不起 -对不起？

translation.en: Sorry? I had to eat dinner with my freakazoid roommate who smells so badly.
translation.zh: 我不得不和那个臭气熏天的 怪胎室友一起吃饭

translation.en: And she would not stop yammering about her pet rat's blog.
translation.zh: 她还不停地抱怨她宠物耗子的博客

translation.en: Wait a minute, we should hook our roommates up together.
translation.zh: 等一下 我们可以让我们的室友凑成一对

translation.en: Mine looks like a pet rat. He's got the nose and everything.
translation.zh: 我的室友像个宠物老鼠 他有个老鼠鼻子

translation.en: He's got the claws. Ew!
translation.zh: 还有双爪子

translation.en: Oh! There you go!
translation.zh: 笑了吧 现在我需要你

translation.en: Now, I need you to help me find this engineering lab.
translation.zh: 帮我找到工程实验室

translation.en: -Moose. -What?
translation.zh: -穆斯 -怎么了？

translation.en: What would I do without you? I don't know. I really don't.
translation.zh: -没有你我可怎么办啊？ -不知道 真的

translation.en: Later, gator.
translation.zh: 回见咯

translation.en: So I see you've found the speaker room. Yeah.
translation.zh: -看来你找到音响室了 -没错

translation.en: Built this myself when we could
translation.zh: 在市里找到合适的音箱也不是不行

translation.en: actually find boom boxes in the city.
translation.zh: 但我还是自己建了一个

translation.en: Impressive.
translation.zh: 真了不起

translation.en: You're up early. Already warmed up.
translation.zh: -起得很早啊 -已经热过身了

translation.en: Good. Because you're my new recruit.
translation.zh: 很好 由于你是新成员

translation.en: And it's my responsibility to get you up to speed.
translation.zh: 让你跟上进度是我的责任

translation.en: Then let's train. No, no. We're not training here.
translation.zh: -那我们训练吧 -不在这儿

translation.en: Okay. Then where? Out there.
translation.zh: -好吧 那在哪儿？ -在那儿

translation.en: Just try to keep up.
translation.zh: 试着跟上

translation.en: [Professor] Before we divide up into lab groups and begin the work,
translation.zh: 在分实验小组和开始实验之前

translation.en: I want to talk to you about what engineering means to me.
translation.zh: 想和你们谈谈 工程学对我来说有什么意义

translation.en: What's your name?
translation.zh: 想和你们谈谈 工程学对我来说有什么意义 你叫什么？

translation.en: And what hopefully engineering will come to mean to you.
translation.zh: 和有前途的工程学对你意味着什么

translation.en: Silence. That's my name. Silence during class. Second of all…
translation.zh: -我叫“别说话” 上课时别说话 -其次…

translation.en: Go answer it, Mr. Popular.
translation.zh: 去接电话吧 万人迷

translation.en: [sputtering] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Open up the cages, boys.
translation.zh: 打开笼子 小伙子们

translation.en: Let's show these newbies why we call this the vault.
translation.zh: 让新手看看为什么这里被叫做保险库

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 让新手看看为什么这里被叫做保险库 好的

translation.en: How are you, my friend? Good?
translation.zh: 穆斯 最近怎样 朋友？

translation.en: What a beautiful senorita. -[speaking Spanish] -Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 多漂亮的妹子啊 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Can I give two?
translation.zh: 亲两下可以吗？

translation.en: Are you gonna get mad at me?
translation.zh: 好的 什么 你会生我的气吗？

translation.en: I'm not gonna get mad at you.
translation.zh: 不 我不会生你的气

translation.en: I'm just saying hi to her.
translation.zh: 只是跟她打招呼

translation.en: No, no, no.
translation.zh: 只是跟她打招呼 -我只是在自我介绍 -不

translation.en: Let me introduce myself.
translation.zh: -我只是在自我介绍 -不

translation.en: Okay, but you're stopping me when I'm introducing myself
translation.zh: 你打断了我向这位美丽的姑娘

translation.en: to this beautiful senorita.
translation.zh: 做自我介绍

translation.en: Don't listen to him. Shh! -You're so cute. -[speaking Spanish] -Okay. Got it. -Okay.
translation.zh: -别听他扯 -你真美

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, our most prized possessions.
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们 我们最珍贵的收藏

translation.en: Check it out.
translation.zh: 看吧

translation.en: [Santiago twin 1] If dance is our weapon, then this is our armor.
translation.zh: 如果舞蹈是武器的话 这些就是盔甲

translation.en: These are the most beautiful shoes in the world.
translation.zh: 这些是世界上最好看的鞋子 老兄

translation.en: The way they smell, the way they feel.
translation.zh: 它们的味道 它们的质地

translation.en: [Santiago twin 2] Hey, you're sounding like a girl.
translation.zh: 你听上去像个娘们 老兄

translation.en: I know you love shoes, but you're like, "I love the shoes."
translation.zh: 我知道我们喜欢鞋子 但你为何讲得那么娘

translation.en: You gotta say, "I love the shoes." like a macho man.
translation.zh: 你应该说 我喜欢鞋子 你该像男人一样说 我喜欢鞋子

translation.en: [Santiago twin 1] Okay, bro. But don't touch me.
translation.zh: 别碰我

translation.en: Luke's lucky shoes? Smart boy.
translation.zh: -他选了卢克的幸运鞋 -他很有眼光

translation.en: [Luke] All right, Moose, don't get too attached.
translation.zh: 好的 穆斯 别太痴迷了

translation.en: You gotta earn your kicks in this house.
translation.zh: 在这里你得靠实力来赢自己的鞋子

translation.en: And beyond door number two, the graffiti room.
translation.zh: 在二号门那边的是涂鸦室

translation.en: Who's that guy?
translation.zh: -那个家伙是谁？ -他是杰西

translation.en: That's Jason. He's our graffiti guru.
translation.zh: -那个家伙是谁？ -他是杰西 他是我们的涂鸦大师

translation.en: I'm talking electronic billboard hacks, led lights,
translation.zh: 我说的是电子公告栏编程 LED灯

translation.en: anything to mark who we are.
translation.zh: 和其他任何可以亮出我们名号的东西

translation.en: Dudes! Excellent timing.
translation.zh: 来得正好 我一直在忙

translation.en: I have been working on the portable light-tagging system
translation.zh: 一个便携式彩灯系统

translation.en: and I can't figure out how to get it to stick to 12-volt batteries.
translation.zh: 我想不出来怎么把它跟12伏的电池连起来

translation.en: You got any electrical tape?
translation.zh: 你有绝缘胶带吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Here you go.
translation.zh: -对 -好 检查下这个

translation.en: -Check this out. Tape it right there. -Yeah? Wrap it around, and it creates a snug fit.
translation.zh: 把它粘在这儿 缠起来把它缠紧

translation.en: You know lights? Yeah, I dabble. Check it out.
translation.zh: -你懂照明？ -略知一二

translation.en: Yeah! Yes! I love this kid. It's the led to the battery to the magnet.
translation.zh: 太棒了 我喜欢这孩子 用磁铁把LED和电池连在一起

translation.en: They're beautiful. Like neon fireflies.
translation.zh: 真漂亮

translation.en: Or neo flies. Yeah, neo flies.
translation.zh: -像霓虹萤火虫 -霓虹萤火虫

translation.en: Neo flies. I like it.
translation.zh: -霓虹萤火虫 -霓虹萤火虫 我喜欢这称呼

translation.en: Listen up. World jam is right around the corner,
translation.zh: 听好 比赛在即

translation.en: but to get there, we gotta get through
translation.zh: 但为了获得比赛资格 我们得赢两场资格赛

translation.en: two qualifying rounds. Which means…
translation.zh: 但为了获得比赛资格 我们得赢两场资格赛 -也就是说 -意味着有很多事等着我们做

translation.en: Which means, we got a lot of work cut out for us.
translation.zh: -也就是说 -意味着有很多事等着我们做

translation.en: Moose, Natalie, you guys in?
translation.zh: 穆斯 娜塔莉 你们加入吗？

translation.en: Um… I don't know, I have to go to school. I can't just…
translation.zh: 不知道 我得上学啊

translation.en: We'll figure something out.
translation.zh: -我不能就… -我们会想出办法的

translation.en: [all banging, chanting] Pirates. Pirates. Pirates. -Pirates. Pirates. Pirates. -Moose!
translation.zh: 海盗

translation.en: I could do one battle, guys.
translation.zh: 我可以斗一场 各位

translation.en: All right, all right. Natalie? House of pirates!
translation.zh: -娜塔莉呢？ -敬海盗

translation.en: This is quite the setup.
translation.zh: -这装备真不错 -多谢

translation.en: Thanks. I collect footage of dancers who inspire me.
translation.zh: 我拍了好些启发我的舞者

translation.en: Clearly. [chuckling]
translation.zh: 很显然

translation.en: What are you gonna do with it all?
translation.zh: 你用这做什么？

translation.en: I don't know, nothing. I just play around with it.
translation.zh: 我不知道 没别的 我只是放来看

translation.en: Check this out… Check. Ch-check…
translation.zh: 看这个

translation.en: I dance… I dance… Become someone else.
translation.zh: 我跳…成为其他人

translation.en: We were born… From a boom box.
translation.zh: 我生来就…

translation.en: I had no idea. They're amazing, aren't they?
translation.zh: -不知道说什么好 -他们太棒了 是吧？

translation.en: I mean you.
translation.zh: 我是说你

translation.en: You're a filmmaker.
translation.zh: 你是个电影制作人

translation.en: What's wrong?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Nothing, I usually don't show people this stuff.
translation.zh: 我一般不会给人看这个

translation.en: It's just me.
translation.zh: 反正我这么想

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Gonna show me?
translation.zh: -能给我看吧 -是啊

translation.en: -Yeah. -Okay.
translation.zh: -能给我看吧 -是啊 好的

translation.en: Promise not to laugh. Oh, I promise.
translation.zh: -答应我不许笑哦 -保证不会

translation.en: Wait, wait, jitterbug, booty shake.
translation.zh: -吉特巴舞 电臀! -对了

translation.en: -Yes. -Okay, okay, okay. This is our teacher in fifth grade.
translation.zh: 好 这是我们五年级的老师

translation.en: Face-lift. Yes! Yes.
translation.zh: -脸部拉皮！ -对 继续

translation.en: Go, go. What are you… Okay. Raptor!
translation.zh: -脸部拉皮！ -对 继续 -猛禽！ -对了！

translation.en: -Yes! -Raptor, yes! I got it!
translation.zh: -猛禽！ -对了！

translation.en: How do you guys even do that?
translation.zh: 你们到底怎么做到的？

translation.en: We can read each other's minds.
translation.zh: 我和卡梅利亚一直心有灵犀的

translation.en: Aw, you guys are so cute. How long have you guys been dating?
translation.zh: 你们太可爱了 你们交往多久了？

translation.en: Oh! No, no, no. It's not like that.
translation.zh: 不 不是那样的

translation.en: We're just friends. [nervous chuckling]
translation.zh: 我们只是朋友

translation.en: [clearing throat] No, correction, everyone, we're best friends.
translation.zh: 错 我们是最好的朋友

translation.en: [both] Aw…
translation.zh: 错 我们是最好的朋友 抱歉啊 得先走一步 有点急事

translation.en: Anyway, sorry, guys, I have to go. I'm in a rush.
translation.zh: 抱歉啊 得先走一步 有点急事

translation.en: Wait, you're leaving? We just started. I'm gonna call you later.
translation.zh: 怎么说走就走？才刚开始呢

translation.en: All right? Have fun. You guys lost. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我迟点打你电话 玩得开心

translation.en: Uh… okay…
translation.zh: -好 -回见

translation.en: Oh, wow. It's so obvious. It makes so much sense now.
translation.zh: 太明显了 现在就更合理了

translation.en: What? You're totally in love with him, aren't you?
translation.zh: -什么啊？ -你彻底爱上他了 是吧？

translation.en: -No. -Yes. No, no, no.
translation.zh: 不是那样的

translation.en: It's not like that. We're just one of those…
translation.zh: 不是那样的 我们只是…我们俩从小一起长大

translation.en: We grew up together. No, no, that would be really weird.
translation.zh: 我们只是…我们俩从小一起长大 我们要有什么也太怪了吧

translation.en: [clearing throat] All right, I think it's your turn. Ready?
translation.zh: 到你了吧

translation.en: Yeah, you're up.
translation.zh: 上吧

translation.en: Okay, you go first.
translation.zh: -好了 -你先

translation.en: Squirrel? Kangaroo?
translation.zh: 松鼠 袋鼠？

translation.en: Hey. Look who's up early now.
translation.zh: 嘿 瞧瞧是谁啊 这么早

translation.en: Actually, I haven't been to sleep yet.
translation.zh: 我压根就没睡

translation.en: Can I join you? Sure.
translation.zh: -我可以上去吗？ -当然

translation.en: What you looking at?
translation.zh: 看什么呢？

translation.en: I come out here to listen.
translation.zh: 看什么呢？ 我到这儿来聆听

translation.en: The river, the traffic, the birds.
translation.zh: 河流、交通、鸟儿

translation.en: Make me feel like I'm a part of something bigger.
translation.zh: 让我感觉置身于更为广阔的天地

translation.en: Traffic makes you feel like you're a part of something bigger?
translation.zh: 繁忙的交通会让你有那种感觉吗？

translation.en: That is deep.
translation.zh: 好有深度哦

translation.en: Like I said, I've been up all night.
translation.zh: 毕竟我一晚上没睡了嘛

translation.en: So, I've been thinking about your video from last night.
translation.zh: 从昨晚到现在我都在回想你的影片

translation.en: Look, I think you should finish it.
translation.zh: 卢克 我觉得你应该把它做完

translation.en: And you should show it to people.
translation.zh: 并且向大家展示

translation.en: Yeah, I don't know about that.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Clearly you love it, right?
translation.zh: 可以肯定的是你确实喜欢 对吗？

translation.en: Look at you. You've been up all night and you're, like…
translation.zh: 看看你 你可以熬通宵做那个

translation.en: I don't know, you're glowing or something.
translation.zh: 看看你 你可以熬通宵做那个 我感觉到你整个人在发光

translation.en: Glowing? [chuckling]
translation.zh: 发光？

translation.en: I see a glow.
translation.zh: 我确实看到了光

translation.en: We should get to red hook. You're right.
translation.zh: -我们得去红钓钩了 -对

translation.en: [man shouting] Welcome to red hook! The first round of world jam!
translation.zh: 欢迎来到红钓钩 世界街舞大会第一轮!

translation.en: Are you all ready for a battle?
translation.zh: 你们准备好了吗？

translation.en: Red hook, are you ready?
translation.zh: 红钓钩 准备好了吗？

translation.en: Pirates, you ready?
translation.zh: 海盗团 你们呢？

translation.en: Let's get it!
translation.zh: 让我们开始吧

translation.en: And the winner is…
translation.zh: 获胜一方是

translation.en: The pirates!
translation.zh: 海盗团

translation.en: [man] The pirates are now into the next round
translation.zh: 海盗晋级世界街舞大赛的

translation.en: of the world jam!
translation.zh: 下一轮！

translation.en: [all chanting] Pirates! Pirates! Pirates!
translation.zh: 海盗！

translation.en: [Luke] No, no, no.
translation.zh: 不 耶

translation.en: [Santiago twin 1] Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: 不 耶 没时间了 赶紧上镜吧

translation.en: Now it's time for you to be in front of the camera,
translation.zh: 没时间了 赶紧上镜吧

translation.en: my good-looking pirate. Yeah. Do you want some makeup, baby?
translation.zh: 帅哥海盗 你还想去化化妆吗？

translation.en: [Natalie] So, Captain Luke. Give me the camera.
translation.zh: -好的 卢克队长 -摄影机给我

translation.en: [all] No, no, no. It's not that easy on this side. It's uncomfortable.
translation.zh: -不行 -被拍也不是很容易 对吧？

translation.en: [Luke] Yeah, why don't you keep walking. Look at this guy.
translation.zh: -你干嘛不继续走着？ -看看这家伙

translation.en: What do you love about dance?
translation.zh: 你为何喜欢跳舞呢？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道 舞蹈音乐

translation.en: Dance, music, it's just always been there for me, I guess.
translation.zh: 我不知道 舞蹈音乐 总会在我左右

translation.en: [Natalie] Is that it?
translation.zh: 就这样吗？

translation.en: What? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Oh. I know you can do better than that. Come on.
translation.zh: 我知道你可以说得更好的 快

translation.en: My parents used to be dancers.
translation.zh: 我爸妈以前是舞蹈家

translation.en: And they started this place for people like them,
translation.zh: 为与他们志同道合的人 开办了这个地方

translation.en: but they didn't just wanna be back-up dancers.
translation.zh: 但他们不想成为谁的替补舞者

translation.en: You know, do their own thing, build their own respect.
translation.zh: 做他们自己的事 挣得自己荣誉

translation.en: I thought that was cool, so I wanted to
translation.zh: 我觉得那样挺酷的 所以打算将之发扬光大

translation.en: carry on the tradition, in my own way.
translation.zh: 我觉得那样挺酷的 所以打算将之发扬光大 用我自己的方式 但也是为他们去做

translation.en: But for them, you know?
translation.zh: 用我自己的方式 但也是为他们去做

translation.en: [Natalie] So what did they think of you turning this place into a madhouse?
translation.zh: 那你把这儿弄得如此疯狂 他们怎么看呢？

translation.en: They never got to see it.
translation.zh: 他们再也看不到了

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: No, don't be. It's okay.
translation.zh: 不用 没事的

translation.en: So that's why you're so devoted to this place?
translation.zh: 那就是你对此地 倾注这么大心血的原因吗？

translation.en: Carrying on what your parents wanted?
translation.zh: 接力爸妈的梦想？

translation.en: Family is family.
translation.zh: 终归是一家人 保险库曾是他们的生活 现在也是我的

translation.en: The vault used to be their life and now it's mine.
translation.zh: 保险库曾是他们的生活 现在也是我的

translation.en: It's amazing what we do for family, sometimes.
translation.zh: 有时我们为家庭所做的付出 是很了不起的

translation.en: So, tell me about your parents.
translation.zh: 那跟我讲讲你父母吧

translation.en: [chuckles] They split up a while back.
translation.zh: 前不久他们刚分开

translation.en: And me and my older brother,
translation.zh: 我和我大哥

translation.en: we were sort of the dice that got rolled between them.
translation.zh: 有点像是在他们之间来回翻滚的骰子

translation.en: Where's your brother now? We're still close.
translation.zh: -你哥哥现在在哪儿？ -我们仍很亲近

translation.en: I mean, he pretty much raised me.
translation.zh: 基本是他把我带大的

translation.en: So, I owe him everything.
translation.zh: 所以我欠他很多

translation.en: So, Tarantino,
translation.zh: 那么 大导演

translation.en: are you planning on blackmailing us with all that footage?
translation.zh: 你是不是在计划 用这些影片来勒索我们？

translation.en: No, just you.
translation.zh: 不是每个人 就你而已

translation.en: All right, so… [sighing] I'm sorry for being late, okay? I won't…
translation.zh: 真抱歉迟到了 我会…

translation.en: Oh! I'm so sorry. I thought you were somebody else, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 不好意思 认错人了 抱歉

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: -好吧 -你知不知道那个把戏

translation.en: Do you know that trick when they take… Really?
translation.zh: -好吧 -你知不知道那个把戏 -真的？ -他们长得几乎一样 应该是双胞胎

translation.en: They kind of look alike. I think
translation.zh: -真的？ -他们长得几乎一样 应该是双胞胎

translation.en: Camille?
translation.zh: 卡梅利亚 什么情况？

translation.en: What's going on? I thought we had lunch.
translation.zh: 不是说好一块儿吃午饭的吗？

translation.en: Is it lunch time? Whoa… Wow. We got so carried away with the costumes,
translation.zh: 到午餐时间了吗？ 我一直忙着服装的事情

translation.en: I totally lost track of time.
translation.zh: 都忘记看时间了

translation.en: Costumes? For what?
translation.zh: 服装 做什么用的？

translation.en: It's for the dorm Halloween party.
translation.zh: 为我们为宿舍的万圣节晚会准备的

translation.en: People plan their costumes all semester.
translation.zh: 有时候整个学期 大家都在为服装作准备

translation.en: All right. So, what are we going to go as?
translation.zh: 不错啊 那我俩要扮什么？

translation.en: Oh… well, actually, I tried calling you, but you didn't pick up.
translation.zh: 是这样的 我给你打过电话可是你没接

translation.en: So Kristin and I are going to be the Olsen twins.
translation.zh: 所以克莉丝汀和我 要打扮成奥尔森姐妹

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. Kristin? Kristin?
translation.zh: 等等 克里斯汀？

translation.en: Camille, Kristin?
translation.zh: 卡梅利亚 克里斯汀？

translation.en: What about Moose?
translation.zh: 那穆斯呢？

translation.en: Go ahead, you guys.
translation.zh: 你们先走

translation.en: You haven't exactly been around lately.
translation.zh: 你最近一直不在

translation.en: I mean, I couldn't wait forever.
translation.zh: 不能总让我等吧

translation.en: Okay, well, hey. I'm here now.
translation.zh: 好吧 可是卡梅利亚 我现在在这儿啊

translation.en: Come on. What do you say?
translation.zh: 你怎么说？

translation.en: You know you're gonna have way more fun with me than
translation.zh: 你知道你跟我一起会更欢乐的 肯定比…

translation.en: Kristin.
translation.zh: 克里斯汀好玩啊

translation.en: Are you asking me to the dance?
translation.zh: 你是在请我参加舞会吗？

translation.en: [scoffing] Camillian,
translation.zh: 卡梅利亚

translation.en: you know that I was born to be the Ashley to your Mary-Kate.
translation.zh: 我们才是天生的奥尔森姐妹

translation.en: Oh, really? Yes, really.
translation.zh: -真的吗？ -真的

translation.en: Okay, okay. Fine, I'll cancel with Kristin. Yes!
translation.zh: -好吧 我会取消克里斯汀的约定 -这才对嘛

translation.en: I'll see you later.
translation.zh: 待会见

translation.en: -Guess I'll see you later, then. -Okay.
translation.zh: 好的 待会见 去你朋友那儿吧

translation.en: Get back to your friend. Hey! Kristin, in your face.
translation.zh: 好的 待会见 去你朋友那儿吧 克里斯汀 不好意思咯

translation.en: [Camille] Bye.
translation.zh: 克里斯汀 不好意思咯

translation.en: [Luke] Okay, you gotta stop complaining.
translation.zh: -好了 也该抱怨够了 -不好意思

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry, I just feel ridiculous holding this giant cup.
translation.zh: 只是觉得拿着这么个大杯挺滑稽的

translation.en: Whoever said it was okay to have small, medium, large and then ginormous?
translation.zh: 谁说过来着 先从小的开始 然后中号 大号 最终才是巨无霸

translation.en: -That's you. -What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 那是什么 是你吧 -说什么呢？ -这家伙太像你了

translation.en: This guy looks exactly like you.
translation.zh: -说什么呢？ -这家伙太像你了

translation.en: No, he doesn't.
translation.zh: -说什么呢？ -这家伙太像你了 才不像

translation.en: He's got a camera popping out of his head.
translation.zh: 你看他扛着摄像机的样子

translation.en: He's got the pretty little cheekbones.
translation.zh: 还探出小小的颧骨

translation.en: It does not look anything like me
translation.zh: 一点也不像我 而且我也不会让那些文化秃鹰们

translation.en: and I would not be caught dead with those culture vultures.
translation.zh: 把我拍成这样

translation.en: I've seen your work, you don't fool me.
translation.zh: 我看过你的作品 你骗不了我

translation.en: Yeah, but it's just for fun, it's nothing professional.
translation.zh: 也许是吧 不过只是玩玩 非专业

translation.en: Well, what if the pirates and the rivalry didn't exist?
translation.zh: 如果海盗和他的对手都不存在呢？

translation.en: Wouldn't you give your filmmaking a shot?
translation.zh: 你会给自己的电影制作 一个尝试的机会吗？

translation.en: That film academy sounds amazing.
translation.zh: 那个电影学院听上去不错

translation.en: Yeah, but it's not an option, so I don't think about it.
translation.zh: 是的 但这不可行 所以我不想考虑这个

translation.en: The world jam's our main focus.
translation.zh: 世界街舞大赛才是我关心的焦点

translation.en: Okay, so tell me, then. How do you do it?
translation.zh: 好吧 你得告诉我 你是怎么做到的

translation.en: Do what?
translation.zh: 做什么？

translation.en: Get all your amazing footage?
translation.zh: 你那些惊人的影片

translation.en: I don't know. I just try to see things
translation.zh: 不知道 我只是试着观察 那些人们未曾留意的东西

translation.en: that people don't normally see.
translation.zh: 那些人们未曾留意的东西

translation.en: You show me?
translation.zh: 演示一下

translation.en: All right, come here.
translation.zh: 好吧 到这儿来

translation.en: [Natalie] Where are you taking me?
translation.zh: 你带我去哪儿啊？

translation.en: Just trust me. Come on.
translation.zh: 你带我去哪儿啊？ 相信我就行了

translation.en: Hurry up.
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: -Just wait for it. -For what?
translation.zh: -等它出现 -什么？

translation.en: Watch this.
translation.zh: 看看这个

translation.en: How did you do that? I want to do it. Okay. -Try it. -Okay.
translation.zh: -怎么做到的？我也想来 -试试

translation.en: See that? I did it.
translation.zh: 看到了吗？我也行的

translation.en: Oh, my God, my straw! I lost my straw!
translation.zh: 天啊 看啊

translation.en: being in my living room, and me and my brother were just
translation.zh: 我想这是在我的卧室里 我和我哥

translation.en: playing around together and
translation.zh: 正在一起玩

translation.en: I always tried to…
translation.zh: 我总是试着

translation.en: To match him.
translation.zh: 跟上他的步伐

translation.en: Moose.
translation.zh: 穆斯

translation.en: Yo! Hey, what time is the battle again?
translation.zh: 那个比赛什么时间来着？
8点 怎么了？

translation.en: -You ready for it? -8:00?
translation.zh: -准备好了吗？ -8点啊

translation.en: It all goes down at Chinatown. This is the house of gwai.
translation.zh: 就在唐人街 这次是鬼域舞队

translation.en: They're champions of Asia, so I hope you're prepared.
translation.zh: 他们可是亚洲冠军 希望你准备好了

translation.en: Yeah, we've got a problem.
translation.zh: 出了点问题 不许有问题 这是第二轮 你必须去

translation.en: No, no. No problems, man. This is round two, you gotta be there.
translation.zh: 不许有问题 这是第二轮 你必须去

translation.en: We can't have any missing links or we
translation.zh: 不能错过任何一场 这样我们

translation.en: could get eliminated from the world jam.
translation.zh: 才不会被世界街舞大赛先行淘汰

translation.en: I know, I know. I have a test on the same exact day.
translation.zh: 我也知道 可那天有场考试

translation.en: I don't know if I can…
translation.zh: -不知道我可不可以 -听着 我们需要你

translation.en: Listen, we need you. Do whatever you can to make it work.
translation.zh: -不知道我可不可以 -听着 我们需要你 尽你所能 把事情安排好

translation.en: [Professor] I'm sure I don't need to remind you how much this test counts.
translation.zh: 显然我用不着提醒你们 这场考试有多重要

translation.en: This is worth 25% of your grade.
translation.zh: 它占了你们最终成绩的25%

translation.en: Take your time.
translation.zh: 别紧张 慢慢来

translation.en: You may begin.
translation.zh: 别紧张 慢慢来 考试现在开始

translation.en: Yo, where's Moose at? I don't know, man.
translation.zh: -穆斯呢？ -不知道

translation.en: Where you been, bro? You just ruined the floor.
translation.zh: 你哪去了？地方都被你弄得一团糟

translation.en: It's over. The winner of the world jam!
translation.zh: 海盗团获胜

translation.en: Hey, can I talk to you for a minute?
translation.zh: 卢克 能和你聊会儿吗？

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
translation.zh: 当然啦

translation.en: -Alone? -Yeah, yeah. Hold on.
translation.zh: -单独 -好的 等会儿

translation.en: Yo! Hold up. Cut the music. -Cut the music. -[music stops]
translation.zh: 停下 关掉音乐

translation.en: You guys need to see this.
translation.zh: 你们得看看这个

translation.en: [woman] It's our entire routine.
translation.zh: -这是什么？ -我们全部的舞步

translation.en: [Santiago twin 1] Why is it online?
translation.zh: 这个网上怎么会有？ 他们知道了我们的全部舞步设计

translation.en: [Jason] I can't believe they know our set.
translation.zh: 他们知道了我们的全部舞步设计

translation.en: Wait, who would do that?
translation.zh: 什么意思 会是谁干的？

translation.en: Julien and the Samurai.
translation.zh: 朱利安跟他的武士团

translation.en: How could they get our rehearsal footage?
translation.zh: 他们怎么拿到我们的排练视频的？

translation.en: Does everyone have their DVDs?
translation.zh: 这里每个人都有视频光碟吗？

translation.en: Are you sure?
translation.zh: -你有光碟吗？ -是的 在我房间里

translation.en: [Luke] We're still in this, all right?
translation.zh: 我们仍旧照练 我们只是需要想点办法

translation.en: We just got to figure something out.
translation.zh: 我们只是需要想点办法

translation.en: Okay, you see there?
translation.zh: 看到那了没有？

translation.en: If you could just let go of that spin, we can land this thing.
translation.zh: 如果你能放弃那个旋转动作 这件事就可以搞定了

translation.en: Those guys may have our tapes, but that won't stop us.
translation.zh: 那些人虽然有视频 可是阻止不了我们

translation.en: Trust me.
translation.zh: 相信我 卢克 我说不好

translation.en: [Natalie] Luke, I don't know. Maybe somebody else should do it.
translation.zh: 卢克 我说不好 也许应该让别人来做这个

translation.en: If we pull this off, we'll kill it onstage.
translation.zh: 如果完成这个 我们在台上会大杀四方的

translation.en: Julien won't know what hit him.
translation.zh: 朱利安甚至不知道自己是怎么败的

translation.en: Whatever happened between you two?
translation.zh: 你们俩有什么过节？

translation.en: Me and Julien?
translation.zh: 你们俩有什么过节？ 我跟朱利安吗？

translation.en: He used to be a pirate.
translation.zh: 他曾经也是海盗团的一员

translation.en: We used to be best friends back in the day,
translation.zh: 我们曾经是最好的朋友

translation.en: but as time went on, things changed.
translation.zh: 可是随着时光流逝 他变了

translation.en: How do you mean, he changed?
translation.zh: 他变了是什么意思？

translation.en: We found out he had a gambling problem.
translation.zh: 我们发现他有赌博的恶习

translation.en: He wound up in bad debts, so desperate
translation.zh: 他在外面参加恶性赌博 如此沉迷

translation.en: that he bet against our own house.
translation.zh: 以至于他竟然 拿自己所在的舞团作赌注

translation.en: And threw the battle to win the bet.
translation.zh: 然后放弃比赛来赢得那场赌局

translation.en: He threw a battle to win a bet?
translation.zh: 他靠放弃比赛来赢赌博吗？

translation.en: The whole house was devastated, so we had to kick him out.
translation.zh: 整个团队都非常震惊和伤心 所以我们不得不踢他出去

translation.en: He's been trying to take us down ever since.
translation.zh: 从那以后他一直想拉我们下台

translation.en: The crazy thing is, if we don't win the world jam,
translation.zh: 令人抓狂的是 如果我们不赢下世界街舞大赛

translation.en: he could actually do it.
translation.zh: 他就真的会得逞

translation.en: You lied to me.
translation.zh: 欢迎回家 你骗我

translation.en: You told me Luke kicked you out because he was jealous.
translation.zh: 你说卢克踢你出去是因为嫉妒你

translation.en: But it wasn't that, was it? You threw a battle for a bet?
translation.zh: 事实并非这样 不是吗？ 你用放弃比赛的卑鄙手段来赌博

translation.en: -Natalie… -Don't.
translation.zh: -娜塔莉 -少来

translation.en: I went in there for you, Julien.
translation.zh: 我去那儿是为了你 朱利安

translation.en: I can't believe you stole that DVD and put it online.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信竟是你 偷走那张光碟 还传到网上

translation.en: What are you talking about? What kind of BS did he say about me now?
translation.zh: 你说些什么啊？ 他跟你说了我些什么鬼话？

translation.en: Luke was jealous!
translation.zh: 卢克是嫉妒我

translation.en: He wanted to be the leader so he kicked me out.
translation.zh: 他想当领导 所以把我踹走

translation.en: He used me and he kicked me out!
translation.zh: 他利用了我 然后把我一脚踹开

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: We have to stick together, Natalie, you know that.
translation.zh: 我们得团结一致 娜塔莉 你懂的

translation.en: I don't like to be lied to.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢被人骗

translation.en: I just want our house to win the world jam. Okay?
translation.zh: 我只是想我们舞团赢得世界街舞大赛 懂吗？

translation.en: We have too much in this, we've worked too hard.
translation.zh: 我们投入了很多 费了不少心血

translation.en: Well, despite what mom and dad say,
translation.zh: 可就是忘了爸妈曾说的

translation.en: it doesn't always have to be about winning.
translation.zh: 输赢并不总是那么重要

translation.en: You're starting to sound like him.
translation.zh: 你现在说起话来跟那家伙一样

translation.en: You need to check yourself and remember whose side you're on.
translation.zh: 好好反省一下 别忘了你是哪一边的

translation.en: Freakin' ridiculous.
translation.zh: 真够滑稽的

translation.en: You know, Luke isn't some monster. He's a good guy.
translation.zh: 其实卢克并不是什么 十恶不赦的坏人 朱利安 他人很好 对他爱的人都极为关照

translation.en: He takes care of the people he loves.
translation.zh: 他人很好 对他爱的人都极为关照

translation.en: Who are you gonna believe? Him or your family?

translation.zh: 两件事 我要一份鸡蛋沙拉三明治

translation.en: and I still think we can win the world jam and get the house back.
translation.zh: 二是 我觉得我们还是应该 去参加街舞大赛 把工作室赢回来

translation.en: I'm out of egg salad and you're out of your mind.
translation.zh: 我这儿没你要的吃的 而且你已经疯了

translation.en: I thought that's why you liked me.
translation.zh: 我以为你就喜欢我这点呢

translation.en: Well, you're still crazy, because we have nobody left.
translation.zh: 是啊 不过你还是太疯狂 -再说我们没人了 -还有我啊

translation.en: But I'm here. Means we got one back.
translation.zh: -再说我们没人了 -还有我啊 你会去劝他们回来的吧

translation.en: Luke, you're the only one that can get everybody back together
translation.zh: 卢克 你是唯一能把大家

translation.en: to save your house.
translation.zh: 重新召集起来 守卫工作室的人

translation.en: The pirates just need your leadership, that's it.
translation.zh: 海盗团需要你的领导

translation.en: They don't need me.
translation.zh: 他们不需要我

translation.en: I took what my parents gave me and threw it away.
translation.zh: 我不过是继承了父母的房子 再将之丢弃

translation.en: You really don't know what you've done.
translation.zh: 你真不知道你做了什么

translation.en: You gave these people a place to live out their dreams
translation.zh: 卢克 你给了这些人一个可以 让梦想起飞 重拾自我的地方

translation.en: and be who they really are.
translation.zh: 让梦想起飞 重拾自我的地方

translation.en: -Sit down, man. -Dude, I got tables to work.
translation.zh: -坐下 -老弟 我还有活要干 别 先坐下

translation.en: No, no. Just take a seat.
translation.zh: 别 先坐下

translation.en: This better be quick.
translation.zh: 有话快说

translation.en: You never asked me why I love to dance.
translation.zh: 你从没问过我为什么要跳舞

translation.en: Do you wanna know why?
translation.zh: 想知道为什么吗？

translation.en: I dance because dance can change things.
translation.zh: 我跳舞是因为舞蹈能改变一切

translation.en: One move can set a whole generation free, like Elvis.
translation.zh: 一个舞步 能使一整代人如猫王般自由自在

translation.en: One move can make you believe like you're something more.
translation.zh: 一个舞步能让人充满自信

translation.en: Remember this one?
translation.zh: 比如这个

translation.en: Ow! Moose, sit down before you make a fool out of both of us.
translation.zh: 穆斯 快坐下 别丢人现眼了

translation.en: And some moves
translation.zh: 而这些舞步

translation.en: can give a skinny, curly-haired kid
translation.zh: 能让一个瘦小、卷发的小孩

translation.en: that just wants to dance
translation.zh: 纯粹地想跳舞

translation.en: some hope.
translation.zh: 为了梦想

translation.en: Hope that he's actually special.
translation.zh: 没有人是独特的

translation.en: [man] Excuse me! Excuse me! Hello.
translation.zh: 对不起 服务生 我的咖啡呢？

translation.en: Coffee. Decaf, don't want it. Regular?
translation.zh: 对不起 服务生 我的咖啡呢？ 不要去咖啡因的 要普通的

translation.en: I'm sorry, I can't. I can't do regular. I tried, it's just not me.
translation.zh: 抱歉 做不到 我努力过 我做不了普通人

translation.en: I've been waiting here for 30 minutes!
translation.zh: 老天 我都等半小时了

translation.en: Hey! He can't do regular, the man said.
translation.zh: 他说了做不了普通的 老兄

translation.en: [man] Yeah, great, Fred Astaire. I didn't pay for a floor show, I paid for some coffee.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信我的咖啡 到现在都没有送过来

translation.en: Okay, that's cool, but how are we gonna get everyone together…
translation.zh: 好了 穆斯 可我们要怎样把大家都找回来

translation.en: I had to get everybody here somehow, man.
translation.zh: 我已经想法子找到他们了

translation.en: Man, did I miss you guys.
translation.zh: 想死你们了 到现在我都不习惯没有你们的相伴

translation.en: My mornings are way too quiet without you guys yapping.
translation.zh: 到现在我都不习惯没有你们的相伴

translation.en: You see? I told you he would miss us.
translation.zh: 看吧 我就说他会想我们的

translation.en: -Okay, okay. You're right. -Good.
translation.zh: 好 你厉害 你说对了

translation.en: Look, I know the odds are against us.
translation.zh: 听着 我知道前方困难重重

translation.en: We have no house, no routine.
translation.zh: 我们没有场地 没有动作编排

translation.en: Hell, I don't even know how we're going to do this.
translation.zh: 更要命的是 我都不知道我们该如何实现

translation.en: But I believe in us and I know you do, too.
translation.zh: 但我有信心 我知道你们也一样

translation.en: That's what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: 说得对

translation.en: Look, we've come way too far to stop now.
translation.zh: 现在说放弃还为时太早

translation.en: I know we can win this.
translation.zh: 我相信我们能赢

translation.en: [all chanting] Pirates. We be the pirates. We be the pirates. We be the pirates.
translation.zh: 海盗团

translation.en: But we still don't have a place to rehearse.
translation.zh: 可我们还是没有排练场地

translation.en: Don't worry about it. Moose says he found us a place.
translation.zh: 别担心 穆斯说他找好地方了

translation.en: Kido.
translation.zh: 迪托

translation.en: What's up?
translation.zh: 还好吗？

translation.en: I miss you.
translation.zh: 我好想你

translation.en: I miss you. Come here, give me a hug.
translation.zh: 我也想你 来抱一下

translation.en: Guys, hey, this is Kido.
translation.zh: 兄弟们 这位是迪托

translation.en: We used to dance together in high school.
translation.zh: 我们以前高中时一起跳舞的

translation.en: Am I missing something?
translation.zh: 我错过什么了吗？

translation.en: What do these games have to do with the world jam?
translation.zh: 游乐场和街舞大赛有什么关系？

translation.en: You said you needed space, right?
translation.zh: 你说过你需要个地方 对吧？

translation.en: I got you, brother.
translation.zh: 想找个地儿练习是吧 包你满意 兄弟

translation.en: [Kido] Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你们

translation.en: [Kido] Come on. This way. Watch your step.
translation.zh: 进来 稍等下 小心台阶

translation.en: You're gonna like this place.
translation.zh: 你们肯定喜欢这里

translation.en: Just come.
translation.zh: 你们肯定喜欢这里 跟我来

translation.en: Ta-da! See, I told you. [Jacob] Oh, no.
translation.zh: 看到了吧

translation.en: Okay, I like it, man.
translation.zh: 哇 我喜欢这儿

translation.en: [man] I used to love this game when I was little.
translation.zh: 我小时候最喜欢这东西了

translation.en: Who do they belong to?
translation.zh: 他们是谁家的？

translation.en: Oh, me. Yeah, I watch them after school
translation.zh: 我 因为他们父母在这里上班

translation.en: because their parents work here.
translation.zh: 他们放学后由我照看

translation.en: [Tick 1] I don't know, guys. Do you think this is gonna work?
translation.zh: 我说不上来 你们觉得这里行？

translation.en: [Jason] There's so much junk.
translation.zh: 到处都是垃圾

translation.en: There's no room and we barely have any dancers.
translation.zh: 没有空地 而且人数也不够

translation.en: Yeah, and the Samurai, they outnumber us two to one.
translation.zh: 没算错的话 武士团在人数上多我们一倍

translation.en: Hold that thought.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: Oh, my God! MSA crew. Long time, no see!
translation.zh: 天哪 我的舞团 好久不见

translation.en: Kido! You ruined our slow-motion thing!
translation.zh: 迪托 好久不见呀

translation.en: Guys, I thought we might need some extra dancers.
translation.zh: 兄弟们 我们应该还要些新舞者

translation.en: Pirates, meet the MSA crew.
translation.zh: 海盗团 来会会MSA舞团

translation.en: -Hey! -Hey! Let's show them what we got.
translation.zh: 让他们瞧瞧我们的本事

translation.en: [Moose] All right, so first up we got… We got a floor master, monster.
translation.zh: 首先介绍 旋转王 老妖

translation.en: We got cable, the man with no bones.
translation.zh: 第二位 无骨人 加伯

translation.en: Fly. Fly can groove and shake.
translation.zh: 第三位 会摇摆的芙莱娜

translation.en: The popping tapper, hair.
translation.zh: 这位是柔韧的波比

translation.en: And last but not least, smiles, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh: 最后一位 女士们先生们 迈尔斯

translation.en: All right, guys, I think this is gonna work.
translation.zh: 好了 各位 我想这样还能凑合

translation.en: "Work"? We gonna kick some ass.
translation.zh: 凑合 我们可是要一鸣惊人

translation.en: Will we win the world jam?
translation.zh: 我们会赢得世界街舞大赛吗？

translation.en: You may have…
translation.zh: 你们可能会

translation.en: Hey, machine. Yo, give me my money back, man.
translation.zh: 把钱还我

translation.en: Hey, guys, check this out.
translation.zh: 各位 过来看看

translation.en: This is what I've made for the world jam.
translation.zh: 试验成功

translation.en: Imagine these lights on this shirt.
translation.zh: 想想我们的舞衣上灯光闪闪

translation.en: I like your dance moves.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的舞步

translation.en: I like your accent.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的口音

translation.en: You like my accent?
translation.zh: 你喜欢我的口音

translation.en: That's good, I like yours.
translation.zh: 好啊 我也喜欢你的口音

translation.en: I don't have accent.
translation.zh: 我才没口音呢

translation.en: [Luke] Carlos…
translation.zh: 卡洛斯 我就知道你会回来

translation.en: I knew you'd come back. We need you, man.
translation.zh: 卡洛斯 我就知道你会回来 因为我们需要你

translation.en: -You need me, huh? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 需要我是吗？ -是啊 -那听好了

translation.en: Well, check this out. Got a message from Julien.
translation.zh: -是啊 -那听好了 -我帮朱利安带个话 -你说什么？

translation.en: What are you talking about? I've been training with the Samurais.
translation.zh: -我一直和武士团一起训练 -什么？

translation.en: -What? -They wanna offer you a deal.
translation.zh: -我一直和武士团一起训练 -什么？ 他们想跟你做笔交易

translation.en: -Is this a joke? -You want the house back?
translation.zh: -开玩笑吗？ -你不是想要回房子吗？

translation.en: You can have it back, free and clear.
translation.zh: 你可以完好无损地拿回房子

translation.en: What's the catch?
translation.zh: 什么条件？

translation.en: -Throw the battle. -[scoffing]
translation.zh: 放弃比赛

translation.en: -Throw the battle. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -要我放弃比赛？ -没错

translation.en: Can't you see?
translation.zh: 还不明白吗？

translation.en: I'm trying to give y'all a chance to have what you want.
translation.zh: 我给了你一个要回房子的机会

translation.en: How could you do this?
translation.zh: 你怎么能这么做？

translation.en: This is real life, Luke.
translation.zh: 这就是现实 卢克

translation.en: When you gonna wake your ass up and see that?
translation.zh: 什么时候你才会明白呢？

translation.en: It's time to grow up.
translation.zh: 是时候长大了

translation.en: The Samurai will win at any cost.
translation.zh: 无论如何 武士团赢定了

translation.en: You need to leave, now.
translation.zh: 你现在马上给我走

translation.en: Think about it. The offer stands.
translation.zh: 好好考虑 现在交易还有效

translation.en: Or you could take your chances at the battle.
translation.zh: 或者你就去赛场上碰碰运气吧

translation.en: What's up, everybody?
translation.zh: 大家好啊

translation.en: My name is Grandmaster Caz
translation.zh: 我叫詹姆士·凯姆

translation.en: and I'd like to welcome you
translation.zh: 欢迎来到

translation.en: to the biggest dance battle on planet earth.
translation.zh: 全宇宙最闪亮的街舞大赛现场

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, this is the world jam!
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 这里是世界街舞大赛

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 舞动起来

translation.en: Coming up next, our main event,
translation.zh: 下面是今晚的重头戏

translation.en: the world jam championship matchup.
translation.zh: 看街舞大赛的冠军究竟花落谁家

translation.en: The house of pirates versus the house of Samurai.
translation.zh: 是大名鼎鼎的海盗团 还是炙手可热的武士们

translation.en: And this battle is the battle you won't forget.
translation.zh: 这将是你永生难忘的比赛

translation.en: Are you all excited?
translation.zh: 你们激动吗？

translation.en: Luke.
translation.zh: 卢克

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 真的很抱歉

translation.en: I know I lied to you.
translation.zh: 我知道我骗了你

translation.en: But everything we had was real.
translation.zh: 但我们之间的感情是真的

translation.en: I'm leaving tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我明天就要走了

translation.en: I'm taking a train to California.
translation.zh: 搭火车去加州

translation.en: And I wouldn't have the courage to do that without you.
translation.zh: 没有你 我将没有离开的勇气

translation.en: I know you have dreams, too.
translation.zh: 我知道你也有梦想

translation.en: This is crazy,
translation.zh: 这很疯狂

translation.en: but come with me?
translation.zh: 可你会和我一起走吗？

translation.en: What makes you think I would trust you again?
translation.zh: 你凭什么以为我还会再相信你？

translation.en: Because that person that I was only with you,
translation.zh: 因为只有和你在一起的时候

translation.en: that's who I really am.
translation.zh: 我才是真正的我

translation.en: [Grandmaster Caz] Right about now, pirates to the stage!
translation.zh: 各位 接下来有请海盗团上台

translation.en: Let's hear it for the pirates, y'all!
translation.zh: 掌声鼓励 请大家拭目以待

translation.en: Luke.
translation.zh: 卢克

translation.en: -Good luck today. -[dance music playing]
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: [Grandmaster Caz] Here they come.
translation.zh: 他们来了

translation.en: But is it enough to upset the mighty Samurai?
translation.zh: 他们能否获胜呢？

translation.en: Only time will tell.
translation.zh: 我们只能等待看最后结果了

translation.en: Samurai to the stage.
translation.zh: 有请武士团上台

translation.en: And here they come, in the black and gold, the Samurai.
translation.zh: 他们身着黑金色战服 他们来了 令人震撼害怕的武士团

translation.en: Looks like they mean serious business!
translation.zh: 令人震撼害怕的武士团

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 比赛开始

translation.en: Pirates, come on. First round, there it is.
translation.zh: 海盗团 他们完成第一轮了

translation.en: Here come the Samurai.
translation.zh: 接下来上场的是武士团

translation.en: Let's see what they're working with, people.
translation.zh: 我们看看他们如何应对

translation.en: [Grandmaster Caz] Uh-oh. This looks personal.
translation.zh: 他们公开挑衅

translation.en: Samurai's wiping up the floor with these guys.
translation.zh: 武士们用舞姿擦亮了整个舞台

translation.en: It looks like it's over. It looks like it's over, people.
translation.zh: 看样子要结束了 各位 快结束了

translation.en: We can take them.
translation.zh: 我们能战胜他

translation.en: You said so yourself, we're not ready.
translation.zh: 你自己说的 我们还没准备好

translation.en: You can trust me.
translation.zh: 相信我

translation.en: [Grandmaster Caz] It looks like it's over!
translation.zh: 看来没戏了

translation.en: There's no way the pirates can come back from this.
translation.zh: 海盗团已经回天乏术

translation.en: Oh, what's this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: The pirates are answering back.
translation.zh: 海盗团应战了

translation.en: Get off the stage.
translation.zh: 下去

translation.en: [Natalie] Get off me, Julien.
translation.zh: 放开我

translation.en: -Hey, wait! -Stop it!
translation.zh: 放开我 -住手 -你在干什么？

translation.en: What are you doing? You can't do this, you're a Samurai.
translation.zh: -住手 -你在干什么？ -你不能这么对你哥 -你不是我哥

translation.en: -Not anymore. -What happened to family?
translation.zh: 那我们的家呢？

translation.en: This is my family, Julien.
translation.zh: 这才是我的家 朱利安

translation.en: Get off me.
translation.zh: 放开我

translation.en: [Grandmaster Caz] Let's get back to business, people.
translation.zh: 我们赶紧回到正题

translation.en: What are they doing? What are they trying now?
translation.zh: 他们在干什么？

translation.en: It ain't over yet.
translation.zh: 比赛还没结束

translation.en: Now, here's the pirate shorties. Oh, my!
translation.zh: 瞧瞧金光闪闪的海盗团哪 老天啊

translation.en: That's it, that's it. It's a wrap.
translation.zh: 好了 我们的决赛选手已经比赛完毕

translation.en: And both of our finalists did their thing.
translation.zh: 我们的决赛选手已经比赛完毕

translation.en: But now, it's time for our judges to decide
translation.zh: 现在把时间交给我们的评委

translation.en: who's going home with this $100,000.
translation.zh: 谁将赢走十万美元的奖金

translation.en: Judges, are you ready with your decision?
translation.zh: 评委们 你们决定好了吗？

translation.en: Whose flag you gonna raise?
translation.zh: 你们将举起谁的队旗

translation.en: Black and gold for the Samurai,
translation.zh: 是武士团的黑金色旗

translation.en: or red and black, for the pirates?
translation.zh: 还是海盗团的红黑色旗

translation.en: Pirates! There it is!
translation.zh: 海盗团

translation.en: Oh, my God! The house of pirates are the winners
translation.zh: 天啊 海盗街舞团是第一届

translation.en: of the first annual world jam!
translation.zh: 世界街舞大赛的冠军得主

translation.en: It's over!
translation.zh: 比赛结束

translation.en: $100,000 to the house of pirates!
translation.zh: 十万元奖金属于海盗街舞团

translation.en: [Natalie] Dear Luke, your film was so great, I had to share it.
translation.zh: 亲爱的卢克 你的电影棒极了 我不得不将其分享

translation.en: I hope you give yourself the chance to live your dream.
translation.zh: 我希望你能给自己一个 实现梦想的机会

translation.en: Love, Natalie.
translation.zh: 爱你的娜塔莉

translation.en: You can go to her if you want to.
translation.zh: 你要想去就去吧

translation.en: I will take care of everything until you get back.
translation.zh: 你回来之前我会照顾好一切

translation.en: You gave us the chance to live our dreams,
translation.zh: 你给了我们实现自己梦想的机会

translation.en: and now it is time for you to go and live your dreams.
translation.zh: 而现在就是你出发 实现自己梦想的时候

translation.en: [Moose] Some famous guy once said,
translation.zh: 有位名人曾说过

translation.en: "To travel is better than to arrive."
translation.zh: 实现梦想的过程要比结果好得多

translation.en: I was like, "What?"
translation.zh: 我当时想 怎么可能？

translation.en: Because I used to think that there is only
translation.zh: 因为也许我当时以为要实现梦想

translation.en: one path to take to where you want to get to be in life.
translation.zh: 只有一条途径

translation.en: But if you choose that one path,
translation.zh: 可如果你选择了一条路 这并不意味着你要放弃其他的方式

translation.en: it doesn't mean you have to abandon all the other ones.
translation.zh: 这并不意味着你要放弃其他的方式 回首成长之路 我明白了

translation.en: I realized that it's actually what happens along the way that counts.
translation.zh: 回首成长之路 我明白了 梦想的实现

translation.en: The stumbles and the falls, and the friendships.
translation.zh: 充满了挫折

translation.en: It's the journey,
translation.zh: 这是梦想之旅

translation.en: not the destination.
translation.zh: 而绝非最终目标

translation.en: You just gotta, I guess,
translation.zh: 我想 你应该相信未来

translation.en: trust that the future will work itself out like it's supposed to.
translation.zh: 我想 你应该相信未来 梦想终将实现

translation.en: I guess I'm asking the school to go freestyle with me, here.
translation.zh: 我请求学校能让我自由地追求梦想

translation.en: But I'm ready to jump.
translation.zh: 但我已经准备好了起跳

translation.en: What you're asking for here is a double major
translation.zh: 在此 你申请的是 工程学与舞蹈学双学位

translation.en: in engineering and dance.
translation.zh: 工程学与舞蹈学双学位

translation.en: Yeah. Well, it's certainly a first.
translation.zh: -没错 -绝对史无前例

translation.en: So?
translation.zh: 怎样？

translation.en: Yeah, I mean… I'm a double major, so…
translation.zh: 我是双学位了

translation.en: [gasping] No way, Moose! Oh, my gosh!
translation.zh: 不是吧 穆斯 天哪！

translation.en: Oh, my gosh! I can't believe it.
translation.zh: 老天 真不敢相信

translation.en: I can't believe it. What do you mean you can't believe it?
translation.zh: 我自己都不敢相信 什么叫你不敢相信？

translation.en: Cam, thank you for being there.
translation.zh: 小卡 谢谢你伴我左右

translation.en: You're welcome.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: What happened? Did you forget something?
translation.zh: 怎么 忘了什么了吧？

translation.en: I think you forgot to say goodbye. [all] Yeah!
translation.zh: 我想你是忘记告别了吧

translation.en: Don't listen to him.
translation.zh: 不 听我说

translation.en: Listen, I kissed your hand, remember?
translation.zh: 我给你我的心

translation.en: -Yeah, so what? -It was me.
translation.zh: 那又怎样？

translation.en: I'm going to miss you guys.
translation.zh: 我会想你们的

translation.en: Give me hug, give me a hug, please.
translation.zh: 来拥抱一下 抱一下

translation.en: Come on, don't cry. Don't cry.
translation.zh: 别哭

translation.en: Where's Luke?
translation.zh: 卢克呢？

translation.en: All right, all right. -[man] Hey! -[laughing]
translation.zh: 好了啦

translation.en: Crazy. Don't listen to them, okay? Okay.
translation.zh: 疯了 别理他们

translation.en: [man] Can I kiss somebody right now?
translation.zh: 现在哪位能让我亲下？

translation.en: Hang on a second, okay? I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 等我下好吗？马上回来

translation.en: This is for you, man.
translation.zh: 这是给你的

translation.en: I'll see you soon. Blow it up.
translation.zh: 来爆一个

translation.en: You're b-fabb. Remember that.
translation.zh: 记住 你是个舞匣子

translation.en: Take care of the house, guys.
translation.zh: 照顾好我们的舞团

translation.en: Open it.
translation.zh: 快打开看看

translation.en: -You ready? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -准备好了吗？ -当然

translation.en: -Let's go party, people. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我们去派对吧？ -好啊
